languages.text: "Сложно объяснить... мирян{mf|ину|ке}. В присутствии объекта наблюдаются феномены метаморфозы. Священные технологии, и даже обычная пласталь начинают вести себя... вольно. Изменять форму, перестраиваться в новые структуры, менять фундаментальные свойства".

"A difficult thing to explain... to a {mf|layman|laywoman}. Metamorphosis phenomena occur in the object's vicinity. Sacred technology and even ordinary plasteel start to behave... wilfully. Shifting, restructuring, and altering their fundamental attributes."
languages.original_text: "Сложно объяснить... мирян{mf|ину|ке}. В присутствии объекта наблюдаются феномены метаморфозы. Священные технологии, и даже обычная пласталь начинают вести себя... вольно. Изменять форму, перестраиваться в новые структуры, менять фундаментальные свойства".

"A difficult thing to explain... to a {mf|layman|laywoman}. Metamorphosis phenomena occur in the object's vicinity. Sacred technology and even ordinary plasteel start to behave... wilfully. Shifting, restructuring, altering their fundamental attributes."

"A difficult thing to explain... to a {mf|layman|laywoman}. Metamorphosis phenomena occur in the object's vicinity. Sacred technology and even ordinary plasteel start to behave... wilfully. Shifting, restructuring, and altering their fundamental attributes."

languages.text: “这件事情……对教外人士而言很难解释。那件物体附近的一切都会发生改变。无论是神圣的技术装置，还是普通的塑钢，都开始……变得毫无规则。它们会不断移动、重组、改变它们的基本特性。”
languages.original_text: "A difficult thing to explain... to a {mf|layman|laywoman}. Metamorphosis phenomena occur in the object's vicinity. Sacred technology and even ordinary plasteel start to behave... wilfully. Shifting, restructuring, and altering their fundamental attributes."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情……对教外人士而言很难解释。那件物体附近的一切都会发生改变。无论是神圣的技术装置，还是普通的塑钢，都开始……变得毫无规则。它们会不断移动、重组、改变它们的基本特性。”

languages.text: « C'est difficile à expliquer... à {mf|un|une} profane. À proximité de l'objet, des phénomènes de métamorphose surviennent. Les technologies sacrées et même le plastacier ordinaire se mettent à agir... de leur propre chef. Ils bougent, se restructurent et modifient même leurs attributs fondamentaux. »
languages.original_text: "A difficult thing to explain... to a {mf|layman|laywoman}. Metamorphosis phenomena occur in the object's vicinity. Sacred technology and even ordinary plasteel start to behave... wilfully. Shifting, restructuring, and altering their fundamental attributes."

traits.locale_text: « C'est difficile à expliquer... à {mf|un|une} profane. À proximité de l'objet, des phénomènes de métamorphose surviennent. Les technologies sacrées et même le plastacier ordinaire se mettent à agir... de leur propre chef. Ils bougent, se restructurent et modifient même leurs attributs fondamentaux. »

languages.text: 「何も知らない人がわかるように説明するのは…少し難しいわ。物体の周辺で変成現象が起きるの。神聖な技術や普通のプラスチールさえも…意志を持ったかのように動き始める。動き、再構築し、基本的な特性を変化させるの」
languages.original_text: "A difficult thing to explain... to a {mf|layman|laywoman}. Metamorphosis phenomena occur in the object's vicinity. Sacred technology and even ordinary plasteel start to behave... wilfully. Shifting, restructuring, and altering their fundamental attributes."

traits.locale_text: 「何も知らない人がわかるように説明するのは…少し難しいわ。物体の周辺で変成現象が起きるの。神聖な技術や普通のプラスチールさえも…意志を持ったかのように動き始める。動き、再構築し、基本的な特性を変化させるの」

languages.text: «Cuesta explicárselo... a {mf|un laico|una laica}. Al encontrarse cerca del objeto se producen fenómenos metamórficos. La tecnología sagrada e incluso el plastiacero normal y corriente empiezan a exhibir comportamientos... deliberados. Cambian, se reestructuran y alteran sus atributos fundamentales».
languages.original_text: "A difficult thing to explain... to a {mf|layman|laywoman}. Metamorphosis phenomena occur in the object's vicinity. Sacred technology and even ordinary plasteel start to behave... wilfully. Shifting, restructuring, and altering their fundamental attributes."

traits.locale_text: «Cuesta explicárselo... a {mf|un laico|una laica}. Al encontrarse cerca del objeto se producen fenómenos metamórficos. La tecnología sagrada e incluso el plastiacero normal y corriente empiezan a exhibir comportamientos... deliberados. Cambian, se reestructuran y alteran sus atributos fundamentales».

languages.text: "Man kann es schwer erklären ... {mf|einem Laien|einer Laiin} jedenfalls. In der Nähe des Objekts treten Metamorphose-Phänomene auf. Heilige Technologie und selbst gewöhnlicher Plaststahl beginnen, sich ... vorsätzlich zu verhalten. Verändern, restrukturieren, verwandeln ihre fundamentalen Attribute."
languages.original_text: "A difficult thing to explain... to a {mf|layman|laywoman}. Metamorphosis phenomena occur in the object's vicinity. Sacred technology and even ordinary plasteel start to behave... wilfully. Shifting, restructuring, and altering their fundamental attributes."
